# pilight-raw\_switch
pilight module for sending/receiving raw codes

# example config
```
{
	"devices": {
		"raw_timings_1": {
			"protocol": [ "raw_switch" ],
			"id": [{
				"id": 100
			}],
			"up-code": "300 870 840 330 300 870 300 870 300 870 300 870 840 330 300 870 300 870 840 330 840 330 840 330 300 870 300 870 300 870 300 870 300 870 300 870 300 870 300 870 840 330 840 330 810 330 840 330 300 870 300 870 300 870 300 870 300 870 300 990 720 330 300 870 300 870 300 10380",
			"down-code": "305 915 915 305 305 915 305 915 305 915 305 915 915 305 305 915 305 915 915 305 915 305 915 305 305 915 305 915 305 915 305 915 305 915 305 915 305 915 305 915 915 305 915 305 915 305 305 915 305 915 305 915 305 915 305 915 305 915 305 915 915 305 915 305 305 915 305 10370",
			"state": "off"
		}
	},
	"gui": {
		"raw_timings_1": {
			"name": "Raw Timings 1",
			"group": [ "main" ],
			"media": [ "all" ]
		}
	}
}
```
